name: setup-uv
description: Set up your GitHub Actions workflow with a specific version of uv

scripts.package: ncc build -o dist/setup src/setup-uv.ts && ncc build -o dist/save-cache src/save-cache.ts && ncc build -o dist/update-default-version src/update-default-version.ts
scripts.act: act pull_request -W .github/workflows/test.yml --container-architecture linux/amd64 -s GITHUB_TOKEN="$(gh auth token)"
scripts.update-default-version: node dist/update-default-version/index.js src/download/checksum/known-checksums.ts action.yml "$(gh auth token)"
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test

author: @eifinger
